alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 07 at 9:48PM AKDT until July 08 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT FOR UPPER TANANA VALLEY AND THE FORTYMILE COUNTRY... * AFFECTED AREA...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * TIMING...Until midnight AKDT tonight. * WINDS...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 80. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
